alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 06 at 11:59AM PST until November 09 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 20 inches possible, highest above 6000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Ventura County Mountains and Los Angeles County Mountains. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. There is a chance of light snow accumulations on Interstate 5 through the Grapevine early Wednesday morning which could result in traffic delays or even closures.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains
